name: General Association Of Hygienists And Municipal Technicians
obverse: Two women, one standing and holding a book with 'HYGIE' written on the cover, the other seated at a desk and holding a scroll. In the upper-right is a window showing a view of a city.
reverse: An angel on his knees holds a plaque above his head. Around the edge of the medal is a wreath.
description: Not much information about this medal exists. The medal appears to have been made to commemorate membership in the General Association Of Hygienists And Municipal Technicians.
On the edge of the medal is a cornucopia and 'BRONZE'.
